title: The Best of The Dan Patrick Show
itunes:title: The Best of The Dan Patrick Show
description:
On Today's Dan Patrick Show, DP talks to Albert Breer about Deshaun Watson's suspension. What options does the NFL have in the aftermath of him only getting 6 games? Pat McAfee calls in and discusses his rise in the media, and Rich Eisen shares his hot take for the 2022 NFL Season!

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
content:encoded:
